headline: Southern California Edison Launches Wildfire Fund
summary: While state and local fire officials have not confirmed the cause of the blaze, SCE says it is “likely” that its equipment could be found to be associated with the ignition.  Pedro Pizarro, CEO of Edison International, the parent company of SCE, said in an interview that the company is investigating in tandem with plaintiffs' attorneys and others.  “That hopefully is providing full transparency and confidence that we're doing this the right way and not doing something that could inadvertently damage evidence or something like that," Pizarro said.

raw.headline: Southern California Edison Launches Wildfire Fund
raw.summary: While state and local fire officials have not confirmed the cause of the blaze, SCE says it is “likely” that its equipment could be found to be associated with the ignition.  Pedro Pizarro, CEO of Edison International, the parent company of SCE, said in an interview that the company is investigating in tandem with plaintiffs' attorneys and others.  “That hopefully is providing full transparency and confidence that we're doing this the right way and not doing something that could inadvertently damage evidence or something like that," Pizarro said.

headline: ADDING MULTIMEDIA / Now Available: Wildfire Recovery Compensation Program for Eaton Fire
summary: ROSEMEAD, Calif., October 29, 2025--Starting today, eligible individuals and businesses can submit claims to receive fast payments and fair resolutions for direct impacts from the Eaton Fire through Southern California Edison’s Wildfire Recovery Compensation Program.

raw.headline: ADDING MULTIMEDIA / Now Available: Wildfire Recovery Compensation Program for Eaton Fire
